school = #{school,jdbcType=CHAR},

update t_education set education = #{education,jdbcType=INTEGER}, school = #{school,jdbcType=CHAR}, first_class = #{firstClass,jdbcType=TINYINT}, major = #{major,jdbcType=CHAR}, educ_picture = #{educPicture,jdbcType=CHAR}, cert_id = #{certId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, talent_id = #{talentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT} where educ_id = #{educId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select education from t_education where talent_id = #{talentId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and `status` = 1
